definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
a shout/fig. opinion or demand, esp. expressed by a group
to call out to/to greet/to say hello to/to inform/to take care of/to take care that one does not
to call out (a name etc)/to shout
to greet sb by word or action/to give prior notice
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement

sentences.english: A young woman exhales cigarette smoke in Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国上海的一位年轻的妇女呼出香烟的烟雾。

sentences.english: Sorry, I am now very busy, please call me at 1015.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我现在很忙，请在1015时再呼我。

sentences.english: Combining the helium and hyperoxia slows down the frequency of breathing while making the air easier to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 氦氧联用减慢了呼吸频率从而使空气更容易呼出。

sentences.english: I was on the Maine Turnpike when you beeped me.
sentences.chinese: 你呼我的时候，我还在缅因州的收费公路上呢。

sentences.english: You can't just flip a switch and jump up production overnight.
sentences.chinese: 你总不能拉个开关就呼一声一夜之间全给生产出来了。

sentences.english: Methods By using the negative high voltage exhaled thoron progeny measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用负高压呼出气中子体测定装置。

sentences.english: Instead of using it to grow, the bacteria breatheit out as carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 细菌难以利用其生长，转而将其以二氧化碳形式呼出。

sentences.english: The gun was pointing at Hoo-Woo.
The past like smoke, exhales from the mouth.
Our Lord is still calling men and women to follow Him.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主仍然在呼召人去跟从祂。

sentences.english: "Shout" of a , the beard worked properly Feng to fling out disaster one net.
sentences.chinese: “呼”的一声，胡灵峰扔出了灾难性的一网。

sentences.english: Feel the diversity in the body, the He Chen finally exhales an one expiration.
sentences.chinese: 感受到体内的变化，贺宸终于呼出一口气。

sentences.english: I also use an NSK eMax micromotor for background removal.
sentences.chinese: 我还使用背景去除1精工最大呼气压微电机。

sentences.english: Now when I play CDs, you hum and tap your feet.
sentences.chinese: 现在我放cd盘，你一边呼，一边用脚打拍子了。

sentences.english: It is a horrible being that spews forth noxious vapors and tramples lesser beings.
sentences.chinese: 这种可怕的生物呼出剧毒空气，践踏比自己小的生物。

sentences.english: Vader exhaled a long breath like a deep sigh.
sentences.chinese: 维达呼出一口长气，它像是一声深深的叹息。
